structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

law.catch_line: Action or proceeding not abated by change.
law.text: An action or proceeding against an unincorporated nonprofit association shall not abate merely because of a change in its members or managers.
law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 21, effective June 24, 2015.
